body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Kenneth Flores and I represent Speedy Motors, how can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello Kenneth, my name is Diane Bennett.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane. Can you confirm your phone number for us in the format zero zero one- two three four- five six seven eight?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's zero zero one- two three four- five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diane. Can you also provide the last four digits of your social security number for account verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits are five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Diane. Your account is verified. How can I assist you with today regarding our car dealership and shipping services?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about purchasing a new car from your dealership, but I have some questions about the shipping process.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to help clarify the shipping process for you, Diane. Thank you for reaching out to us with your questions. Is there anything specific you would like to know about the shipping process or any concerns you have?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you again for contacting us, Diane. We appreciate your time and look forward to assisting you further. Have a wonderful day!
